summary: Sarah and Josh are married suburbanites. After a car accident, Sarah suffers blackouts. As her life spirals she hides a camera in her home and unlocks a horrific secret with far-reaching consequences.
cast: Jon Abrahams|Andrew Beckham|Jeanette Branch|Caroline Clements|Laura Gordon|Nathan Keyes|Matt Passmore|Brian Patacca|Steve Rizzo|Alexandra Straus|Katie Walder|Maura West|Pete Williams
keywords: rape|woman raped while unconscious|return from dead|supernatural power|based on a novel
title: Come Back to Me
